name: Antiqua Portable CD Player — Globe Chaser X1
description: It doesn’t look like much, but the damn thing doesn’t quit. Spirits like the familiar rhythm.

name: CivicLink Model — O-1 (Obama Phone)
description: Issued freely to ensure digital inclusion. Notorious for running too hot when pushed.

name: Banana-Phone (Mobile) — Bananaware B-2 Flex
description: Shaped like a joke. Not treated like one. Foldable, runs on rechargeable biocells.

name: Mechane Cellular — Mechane Type-4 Handset
description: Blessed by the minor machine-spirits of the workshop. It never quite dies. Rugged, tinker-friendly.

name: ScarFix Duet — Handheld Gaming "Friend"
description: A beloved retro handheld gaming device. Favored by the summoning community.

name: Woden SpectraGlass AR Visor
description: A failed consumer AR device that found a second life through the Veil. Incredibly dorky to wear.

name: Scarfix Super Pocket Guardian — Handheld Gaming "Pet"
description: A virtual pet COMP that never goes away. Popular with nostalgic adults.
